website_summaries.verdict: A casual sandal with extra support and grip.
pros: Comfortable and with easy-to-adjust suede straps
Shoes are treated to prevent odor
A good Teva for those who want extra comfort and support
cons: Not as durable as other Teva models
Some customers noted that the stitching in straps is uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design / quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in Feb 2018. Maybe used them 8 times kayak fishing. One sandal completely fell apart after walking through some mud. Terrible design in terms of not having the straps secured well to sole; narrow cloth attachments and inferior glue. Thought these would last better than my other Tevas, which also failed due to inferior glue used on soles which de-laminated completely after two years. For the price, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Wide feet Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted this sandal to be it! Price and looks were right for what I wanted. Probably the best style sandal Ive seen. Up close you can see the time taken into the designing of the layers and stitching. The only problem I had was with the inside area near the arch. It was too narrow and rubbed quite a bit. Felt like my foot was hanging over a bit but in length they were right, couldnt go bigger. Other Teva's Ive had are more open on the sides and less restrictive to wider feet. As I learned while shopping, EVERYONE'S foot is different so this sandal will be great for lots of people.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: I Don't Even Think About Them
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Great adjustment range. I have worn Orthaheel Vionic sandals for a few years and find these to be just as comfortable. The arch is not quite as pronounced as with the Vionic but there is plenty of support. Size was spot-on for me. (I ordered same size as my Orthaheel Vionics.) I wear sandals when hiking in southern Utah and northern New Mexico. The sole pattern on these sandals is aggressive and should work well for hiking. Ditto the sole thickness and foot bed - should be a very good hiking sandal. As the headline says, "I don't even think about them when I am wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Webb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Great Style, High Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable sandals so far. I got the light tan ones with the orange and the colors are great. These sandals look and feel high quality.I definitely recommend them. I have a feeling these are going to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Absolute total disappointment. less than a year old
customer_reviews.text: I wore these as seasonal sandals for one season. I live in KY, so not a ton of use. I put these on while in central america and after a modest hike, the webbing came apart at base of the sandal. Then an hour later the other side broke too. Absolute total disappointment. less than a year old, maybe 25 days worn and they were totally useless. I threw them away because I was not going to travel across central america with broken shoes for 1 month to get back and try to return. Dumb me, I should of taken pictures. Anyway, These shoes were comfortable but total garbage. go with the Chocas. I don't know why I ever switched!
customer_reviews.author: Grayson

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISSAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two pairs of Teva's such as this over a period of 30 years. Each pair lasting about 15 years. I've used them for everything even heavy backpacking. That's why I had no doubts as to this purchase. I have not used this pair harshly, but noticed a serious tear forming on leather holding the piece of plastic that fits the ankle strap through.I know how to adjust all the straps to make a perfect fi, But this tear will rip before the week is out. I've only had this pair for a little over two months and cannot return them to Amazon. A waste of money. I will try the company.
customer_reviews.author: Karl E. Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Worn these through thick and thin and I love them. They dry fast
customer_reviews.text: Worn these through thick and thin and I love them. They dry fast, they don't absorb odor as fast as others, and now they don't irritate my skin which is somewhat sensitive. I think it took a little getting wet and a little use for them to stop irritating my feet, but after a week or so they are perfect. They are very cushiony but also very supportive and the hard bottoms help me not feel a thing I'm stepping on. They've gotten absolutely soaked and they never get soggy or weird after, just a simple rinse makes them good as new.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaD

customer_reviews.title: Good buy  with some discomfort
customer_reviews.text: The Teva Katavi Sandal fit fine, are lightweight, and look good at a very affordable price. However, they are not as comfortable as I would like The strap that goes over the ankle is less than an inch wide with no cushioning material beneath. With the strap pulled tight to keep the feet from sliding around the bare foot suffers a bit. I compare these sandals to my older very comfortable (and more expensive) sandals which have a 2 inch wide strap and rubbery material beneath.. The Katavi feels fine when wearing socks, however, but I do have to put up with some guffaws from my grandsons!
customer_reviews.author: Harty Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality affecting life cycle
customer_reviews.text: This product fits great and feels great, but the material holding the buckle ripped after 5 months. The other sandal is starting to tear as well by the buckle. I wear these about twice a week, so they are not an everyday sandal. This is not the quality I would normally expect from Teva. I am past the return option through Amazon, so I'm working through Teva directly to utilize their one-year warranty policy.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Don't Last
customer_reviews.text: For the price, would have expected more than two summers of light use before the straps pulled out of the sole. Looking for another alternative to the Nike ACG's I wore into the ground but never broke.
customer_reviews.author: D. LaRocque

customer_reviews.title: THE SANDALS ARE FINE. THE VELCRO FRONT WAS SO SHORT THAT IT ...
customer_reviews.text: THE SANDALS ARE FINE. THE VELCRO FRONT WAS SO SHORT THAT IT BARELY REACHED THE HOOK PART ON THE OTHER SIDE. SENT BACK. I HAVE OWNED ABOUT 30 PAIR OF TEVA. NEVER SEEN ON THAT SHORT.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Crenshaw, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Broken After Just Over 5 Months
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that these sandals, which I received only 5+ months ago, have broken. Except for the strap separation, they are in very good condition. The strap on one sandal came out of the back of the upper part of the sole rendering it useless. I'm hoping that Amazon does the right thing and offers a replacement. My previous pair of Teva sandals that I bought at a brick and mortar store lasted years without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Put thru hell, lasted a year
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything about these, felt great, easy to put on, but a year later aND the soul seperated from the body (sounds funny) while walking on the beach. I mean I beat the hell from these, wearing them alot and in water alot, always got them wet. I give 4 stars because of the abuse, but sad they did this. I will buy another pair and see. I mean they are sandels and I treated them like hiking boots but hoped more than a year so 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Failed x3
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good looking. I went thru two pairs in 6 mos ....on both, the straps pulled out of the sole. Teva gave me the second pair on warranty return. Also, the small rectangular buckle turns sidways ....so the strap gets crunched into the narrow slit end of it instead of the wide surface. You will regret buying these. Don't do it. Only buy Teva's with triangular buckles
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: sizing has changed
customer_reviews.text: Had it not been such an issue to return because of COVID-19 shutdowns I definitely would have sent back this item. Bought a pair like them a couple of years ago and was pleased. This time the strap legnths were too short and skimpy, very uncomfortable for a person with high instep. I was able to stretch straps enough to get by, but discolored the suede in the process. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy on/Easy off
customer_reviews.text: I live in a hot climate and I walk a lot. I like the support these give me for short walks. I switch to hiking boots for any serious walking. I usually wear heavy walking socks because my feet sunburn easily. These are easy on/easy off and get the job done. This is my second pair of these and the first pair lasted about three years and I only replaced them because the velcro straps wore out. Great sandals.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: They feel good and look good.
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted Teva shoes for quite a while, not sure why I waited so long. They are great. I especially like the straps to hold in my heel when I walk. With flip flops I tend to step to the side and my heel hits the ground. Teva is perfect for me. They look good and more importantly, they feel good. That is important for me since I have very tender feet. It is one of my better purchases on Amazon. One last thing, I wear a size 14, so most stores on carry up to size 13, so Amazon came through with a good selection of larger sizes, yeah...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I buy a new pair of Teva sandals every year. I had this style and it lasted well but Amazon reduced the price to $45 and I couldn't resist buying 3 pairs for future use. Normally, I'll do some hiking or even get my Teva's wet. I didn't do either with this pair...just normal walking...not even exercising, and the back stitching came out after 4 months of use. I've never had a poor quality made one until now and this has me concerned about the 2 pairs I haven't worn. I think Amazon knew there was something with the batch they had and reduced the cost. I saw another guy post the same problem. I'm disappointed
customer_reviews.author: I Love Life

customer_reviews.title: My husband swears by these sandals
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the man who would wear sandals -- these sandals -- every day for the rest of his life. We know live in a warmer climate and he has a job where he often can wear sandals even to work. He loves them because he can wear them with khakis or shorts, and can hike, walk and go to the beach. These are the only sandals the man wears, so when they wear out, he asks me to order more. God forbid if Teva ever stops making them.
customer_reviews.author: Jen K

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 sizes please
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals, very light and comfortable. I wear a 10 1/2 and went with a 10. I've tried 11 with other sandals and they felt really big. I had to do about 10 minutes of strap adjusting so my toes didn't hang over the front, nor my heels over the back. Now were good and it feels great on my feet, but certainly could have used a 10 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Abec

customer_reviews.title: Broke! Not even a year old.
customer_reviews.text: I've had Tevas for over 20 years. Never once had I had them break before they were even a year old. So disappointed. These were used just around the yard. Considering the price these should have lasted way longer.
customer_reviews.author: MindiP

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for those around water
customer_reviews.text: These Tevas were a fantastic deal! My husband has been looking to replace his old pair. We were at a local water park when they were delivered. He was so excited, he threw his old Tevas away while we were there! He even tried them on with his socks on, because he was anxious to try them on and because he likes to embarrass our teenagers. Perfect shoe for those who like to be around water.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: love 'em cnt wait to break them in I do ...
customer_reviews.text: love 'em cnt wait to break them in I do own a pair of Teva Terra Float Slides and they are holding up great wear them all the time bought them back in march 2017.. btw I used to buy Birkenstock sandals forever but not anymore.. Teva is better in construction. they hold up, foot straps will not flab down and very comfy
customer_reviews.author: Dupa

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: In tennis shoe normally wear a size 10.5. These sandals only come in even sizes, so I read the other reviews and they stated they ran a bit large. A size 10 was perfect. Like the Velcro straps and rubber bottom. Great!
customer_reviews.author: SLawless

customer_reviews.title: Always the BEST...
customer_reviews.text: I've had Teva's for over 30 years. They're other brands out there, but I keep coming back. I'm now over 60, and the feet aren't perfect anymore, with 3 different adjustment areas, I can dial them in perfectly. Summer here in San Diego, even though it's only February 😉. I won't take these off till next December when winter stars again. My goto "Cuuose"
customer_reviews.author: Sean McGoey

customer_reviews.title: Extremely adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I normally buy size 9.5 shoes even though my foot size is a 9 because I wear an orthotic (brace) on my left leg that extends into my shoe. I ordered these sandals in a 9 as they don't come in half sizes. I was easily able to adjust the straps on both sides to accommodate the different sizes I needed from left to right. These are the best sandals I have ever bought! They are very comfortable and sturdy. I am actually buying 2 more pair so that I will have them for when these finally wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Music Guy

customer_reviews.title: Greats sandals !
customer_reviews.text: I love Tevas and have worn them all my life. These Sandals worked well for,about two years but recently all the straps have started pulling out of the shoe. No way to really fix it. These are the only Tevas I have broke. But they have been very comfy and supportive. I've hiked all over the Georgia mountains, rivers and lakes of Wisconsin and the beaches in Florida and it is amazing the traction these shoes offer. Would be 5 stars had they not started falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Cox

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend these enough
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these sandals in 2 years. The pair broke after two months use and I contacted the company. Turns out I these come with a one year guarantee. The company did everything they could to make me happy and went over and beyond what I expected. Couple days later I have a new pair of sandals and they are holding up great
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: The sandals were comfortable, and I made similar adjustments to both sandals
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is a blister that doesn't heal on my right big toe. The sandals were comfortable, and I made similar adjustments to both sandals, but for some reason the right toe was rubbed raw, so I have to wait and let it heal. I have worn socks and it is comfortable, but it still irritates the sore area, so I'll just wait and see what happens. I stated that they were "somewhat small", but in reality they are a good fit, though snug.
customer_reviews.author: D Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Loved the shoes but should last longer Update
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these a year ago for a seasonal sandal and the strap broke today. THe front straps pulled out.Expected them to last longer. Teva honored one year warranty!! And sent credit
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: The only type sandals I can wear is this kind, with straps. The slip ons tend to slip off my feet while walking. But I was never able to find one with an open toe or minimal material in the toe area, until I saw these. The Teva sandals are of good quality. The inner soles provide good cushion support and also good arch support. The outer soles are thick and durable. I walked miles in them one day on the Wildwood boardwalk and my feet were fine. The straps are easy to adjust and the Velcro works great. Also, they fit true to size. I highly recommend these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Felix E.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about a year ago and they have lasted me well. I love in Florida where I'm able to wear them almost all year long. Length of them seem true to size, they are a bit wider than standard sizes but that works well for me because I have wide feet. They have lasted very well wearing them almost every day and getting wet a few times. I wouldn't hesitate to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Repasky

customer_reviews.title: Right price and fit
customer_reviews.text: Completely comfortable for me, right out of the box, no break in period or painful arch. But that's just me..... I liked the back strap adjustment on my last pair (not the same version) Don't know if the quality is less than those sandals that I was looking at for double the price, but it fit my $ wants and I'm glad I bought them. My last Teva's lasted many years so I had that trust.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Just Ok. They arrived and I eagerly put them on and was immediately disappointed. My trusty old pair was of much better quality and fit well. But after 5 years, wore out. These were to small, and frankly feel cheap. I guess it's the price. My last pair was around $80 and these were much less, so I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Updated review:  THEY DON'T LAST!  The straps break off!
customer_reviews.text: These are becoming my favorite sandals. At first there was a little bit of the leather that rubbed on my foot so i cut it off and now no problem. Seems to be much much sturdier than the New Balance sandals ive bought recently. NB seems to using cheaper materials all the time. So 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Test

customer_reviews.title: A great sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a pair of sandals which would open fully at the back, to allow my swollen foot to get in it. Actually, I have worn only these shoes since receiving them. I bought a size 12 (I wear 11 1/2) and they just fit well and re extremely comfortable. Thanks, Teva! I'll be back. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe O.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: The last time I bought a pair of Teva's was, literally, 20 years ago. I got into a car accident and my feet swelled. I say this only b/c I took the sandals out of retirement and wore them everyday for over a year as they were the only option in my closet that fit. I finally "broke down" and bought a replacement - men's Kativa. They are brilliant. Super solid construction, stable, comfortable and they look great. I might encourage people to size up but I suppose that's an individual decision. And, they look SO much better than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Harland Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Broken Strap problem
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months of use my rear strap broke. This is the second pair out of five I have purchased where a strap broke. Fortunately on this last one it is covered by warranty for one year. I think I'll try another sturdier model next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wallig

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Worn every day for a few months now. Very comfortable and seem to be well made. The short straps have stretched and are OK now. Used for everyday walking in Florida and hiking and canyon rock climbing near Vegas, so far so good and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: nb

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but sizing is always iffy
customer_reviews.text: So, why don't all shoe companies make half sizes? I wear a 10.5 and after reading all the reviews, decided that a 10 would be the best fit. Wrong. My toes touch the edge of the sandal. Can't return them as I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. KeeganTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Tough.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my last pair of Tevas 7 years ago and they still wear fantastic. Tough as nails but look a little worn which why I bought the new ones. I took these on vacation and walked all over universal and disney for 6 days. Sun up to late night they were comfortable and still look new two months later. These cost more than some of their competitors but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Beauseph B

customer_reviews.title: All day comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Teva’s. They are comfortable and stylish. I wore them all day recently. I was on my feet walking around the local Home & Garden show. When we were heading home I noticed my feet didn’t hurt or feel fatigued. Typically after a long day of standing and walking in my old sandals, my feet would hurt and be tired. Not the Tevas. I’m ordering another pair of a different style. Love my Tevas.
customer_reviews.author: bilran

customer_reviews.title: Glue not holding after one year
customer_reviews.text: I have had the sandals for 1 year and the glue that binds the straps to the sole is not holding. The sole is also separating on one shoe. I have had to take the sandals apart and re-glue to straps to the sole. The sandals are comfortable for the price, but the glue should hold for more than one year.
customer_reviews.author: Microgrl

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Sandal from Teva, with Technological Improvements over Previous Models
customer_reviews.text: Teva has produced another winner. I was upset because my Teva Trail Wraptor sandals are getting old and they have been discontinued. The Katavi looks like the closest replacement. Compared to the Trail Wraptor, the Katavi is equally comfortable, lighter in weight and has a slightly wider and more stable stance. The Katavi sandals are so comfortable that after putting them on and getting used to them, I am not aware that anything is on my feet. It comes in two colors; I bought both so that I can change them on alternate days and not get them mixed up.
customer_reviews.author: Indian Cook

customer_reviews.title: ... made for the money and according to him quite comfortable. He normally wears a 10 and 1/2 but ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes these sandals - they are well made for the money and according to him quite comfortable. He normally wears a 10 and 1/2 but they only come in whole sizes and the 10M. fits him - the 11 is too big. They are easy to put on and take off (He has Parkinson's and needs something easy to deal with). I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Leonaard

customer_reviews.title: Teva Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Teva Men's Katavi Outdoor Sandal, Brown, size 11. If you are looking for something that is well designed, well made, and will last as long as you could expect a sandal to last, buy Teva. The size 11 that I purchased was true to size. You can find cheaper sandals online, but not better.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon P. Noens

customer_reviews.title: Great for Disney World
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sandals for my husband. I love the TEVA brand and the way they fit and support your feet. He put them on first day and never had to break them in. We walked over 10 miles a day, and his feet were comfortable in the sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable but Light Duty
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and stylish. Surprisingly good support for open style sandals. My last pair of Tevas lasted 9 years. I don’t think these will last that long (they seem to be light duty hiking sandals).
customer_reviews.author: A. Kashyap

customer_reviews.title: My third pair for a reason
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these sandals, the last pair lasted 2 years wearing them almost daily. The soft cushiony feel of the sole makes them very comfortable, probably should have replaced the last pair sooner because the cushion was pretty much gone, something I didn't even realize till I put the new pair on. The last pair was purchased at a Sporting Goods store where I tried on about 12 different pairs of sandals and when I found a pair I liked my son said, "those look a lot like your old pair" sure enough they were the exact same!! I will buy these again when this pair wears out, just hope Teva still makes them
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals, had them many years ago and they last. Even with feet pain they are comfortable. My dog and I can walk on the sand and through the waves and they dont come off. Wash them or hose them off. I love the Amazon wardrobe!! I tried on different sizes and colors. Kept the ones I wanted to sent back the rest
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Guntert

customer_reviews.title: Great Men's Sandal
customer_reviews.text: These sandals off good support and have excellent traction on the bottom. My husband has a bad back, so the arch support is important. he also likes to hike in the woods and go fishing, and these sandals are perfect for both of those activities. The only thing you need to be careful of is the sixe. My husband normally wears a 10.5, so I initially bought him a size 11 since it doesn't come in half sizes. They were much too big, so I returned them and got the size 10s which fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Andros

customer_reviews.title: All day comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I had a very old pair of Teva's that finally wore out... as comfortable under foot as the original's were, these are more so. The straps are softer around their edges and the foot bed is soft enough to wear all day. These are waterproof so washing the car, wearing them into rocky bottom water etc is easy. I enjoy them very much!
customer_reviews.author: robert ebstein

customer_reviews.title: Definitely run small.
customer_reviews.text: I do a 10.5 wide or 11 regular width. I got these in size 11 and they are definitely smaller than my old sandals. Just fit. Also on my old sandals I could just loosen the main strap and slip them on. Now I loose the strap and have to fuss a bit to get them on. On the plus side, they appear well made and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BLS-Bikes

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sandals!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES these. He'd never worn a pair of Teva's before but knew I liked mine. I bought him a pair for his birthday and he put them on right away and didn't want to take them off!! He says he's never had such a comfortable pair of sandals before. He can wear them all day with no foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: acarolinea

customer_reviews.title: Great TEVA sandal for the price..
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old worn out TEVA sandals with these, I wear a size 13.. These feel pretty comfortable and appear to have quality construction. I liked the way my older TEVA pair fit, which is why I didn't give ALL stars..
customer_reviews.author: Paul Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting sandals
customer_reviews.text: I bought one pair of these in April 2018. They've been my primary footwear for 2 1/2 years and still function perfectly. The only sign of wear is a scuff on the heel of the right sandal, probably from aggressive use moreso than a lack of durability.
customer_reviews.author: Scabies

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only a year
customer_reviews.text: These sandals look great and feel great, But they broke after only a year, I live in a northern climate so I can’t even use them for the full year I would guess I maybe wore them 20 times. Never for hiking or rough terrain. The front strap pulled out while sitting on a beach.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: My husband's favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these sandals we've purchased; the first pair lasted only 13 months before the straps pulled away from the footbed, which is why I knocked a star off. To be fair, my husband wears his sandals to death (which is why I only took one star off). For the price, we'd expect these to last at least two or three years, but he wears his sandals from the time the snow has melted enough to see the ground until the snow comes back to stay. Other than that issue, these are super comfy (he says) and it's pretty much the only brand/style he'll wear.
customer_reviews.author: Bronwyyn

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore these sandals for 3 weeks while on vacation and they fell apart - literally.
customer_reviews.author: Smiggs

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor sandal! Easy in-out, good support.
customer_reviews.text: I had Teva outdoor sandals for years, the soles eventually failed. There was no question I was going back to Teva, the fit is terrific for my foot. But I took the opportunity to get the ones with the clip for quick on-off, instead of messing with the velcro each and every time. It was the right choice, the clips make it so much easier to get them on and off. The sole is nice, not too squishy and with good support. Nice color, materials and finish. So glad I went with this model!
customer_reviews.author: Guillaume Lefebvre

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of Sandals I've owned to date!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I ware sandals most of the time, and these are the best (for me) that I've found to date! They fit well, are comfortable (even with my wide feet) and have good grip in town or on the trails. Wore out my last pair, so I bought two sets (different colors).
customer_reviews.author: M. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Broke on vacation
customer_reviews.text: Love the sandals, my second pair. My old pair are still good, just very worn and want a new set for vacation. Wore very little, maybe 3 times. Today, first day of my Vegas vacation, the rear strap broke. The one that holds the buckle. What a shame. Too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of sandals. But I have a vacation coming up to the beech, and we all know sneakers or boots don't really go well with sand and water. So I did my research and settled on these sandals. I couldn't be happier. They fit nice and secure, are extremely comfortable, and feel high quality. I have only had them for a day or so, so I can't comment on the long lasting. I will update this review if I find any issues after I have them out in the elements (rain, sand, salt water, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sandles at fair price
customer_reviews.text: These sandles are very comfortable. I have worn them in the water and they dry quickly. Also wore while walking all day and didn't bother my feet. My only complaint is the heal strap isn't high enough for me it stays in place but would feel better if was little higher.
customer_reviews.author: Thor T.

customer_reviews.title: Quality sandal and good price
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these I've had in the last five years. Great quality, easy to put on and take off. They hold up really well in wet areas and have great traction.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, resonably priced, but straps fail
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair I've had. The fabric that holds the adjustment rings for the straps has been the first thing to fail for me, even when the rest of the sandal, including the tread is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Not great but with some investment it should be OK
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised and how poorly made these were . I have purchases brand many times in the past but only to find out that the Velcro is poor quality. It is sad that this product has gotten less quality driven. I will need to take it to a shoe specialist to have the Velcro replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Shelton

customer_reviews.title: While the same model as I have had twice before ...
customer_reviews.text: While the same model as I have had twice before, it seems that it is made of thinner and cheaper material.
customer_reviews.author: Celt

customer_reviews.title: I owned the walnut colored one for 5 months. ...
customer_reviews.text: I owned the walnut colored one for 5 months. I use mine for kayaking and walking in general, no extreme hiking (yet). My right sandal has fallen a part. 4 of the 8 leather straps that goes in to the sole has come out. I barely made it back home from my vacation, these where my only shoes...
customer_reviews.author: HTD

customer_reviews.title: Best quality sandals I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I bought my previous pair of Teva's in 1998 and they've been worn every summer all over the world until finally a strap gave out last week. My new pair just arrived (almost exact design from 98) and they are still the same sturdy construction and instant comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D

customer_reviews.title: Great for those Jungle Walks!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! I went to Costa Rica and these were my go to choice vs Flip Flops. I used them on sharpe rocks in and out of water, for ATVing across towns. I even traveled back to Florida with them on. They dry quick, are super comfortable and the tracking is great for the mud and slippery rocks I encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, amazing quality.  Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are my Dads favorite shoes. He moved to Florida 3 years ago and we bought them for him for Christmas. He hasnt taken them off since.... he has deep dark tanlines feom where the sandel straps go across his feet haha. Needless to say he adores them.
customer_reviews.author: WORCESTER

customer_reviews.title: Best Sandals He's EVER had
customer_reviews.text: After my husband going through and ruining a few pairs of sandals a year I decided to get him Texas. My Teva's are still in excellent condition. He texted me "these are the best sandals I have ever had! I love them! Thank you!" If these fall apart quickly like the last pair on Amazon did, you best believe I will update!
customer_reviews.author: Emily DSch

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: These sandlas are lightweigth but sturdy. The three adjustable straps make it impossible not to fit, as long as you pick the right size. I was lucky that my extra wide 11 was in stock. The straps are well cushioned. Overall, a high quality and comfortable sandal; perhaps the best I've owned, and I live in sandals nine monmths of the year.

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately during routine wearing
customer_reviews.text: On the first day being worn, the back strap snapped while walking. It was flimsy and just horrible quality. I’m not sure if Teva products have taken a nosedive in quality or the particular seller on Amazon is selling cheap knockoffs at full price. Either way I would stay away.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bozz

customer_reviews.title: All Purpose Sandal Does It All
customer_reviews.text: These are great sandals. My second pair of this particular model of Teva. First pair lasted easily over 5 years and went through everything - hiking in lava fields, kayaking, white water rafting, and general wear. Good grip and a stiff enough of a sole to withstand sharp rocks and lava. This pair has slightly thinner material for straps but feel adequate to the task. Good comfort. Great Value!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Brown

customer_reviews.title: Current Trapping
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality reeks of cheap. My first impression is of $3.99 flipflops with a leather straps. The straps are thin, and and a likely failure point. The fit is poor, and frankly --- the straps bit into the flesh. The specimen I received looks like a modification of the photo, so it could be that the manufacturer is cutting corners to boost profit. Thankfully, this is a free return itme ... because, its going back as a free return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Drone

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals.  Lightweight and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I wanted. I was replacing a pair of Clark's sandals but they are no longer being made. These are probably even better
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Beede

customer_reviews.title: My third pair!
customer_reviews.text: I do like these. I've had two previous pairs and had been waiting for the price to drop and when it did, I moved! They wear well and are light weight. This is Arizona and for a good part of the year sandals of some sort are in order and these fill the casual wear needs.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: My original, shop purchased - teas lasted for a couple of years. Either Amazon has a batch of fake Tevas. Or this is the worst sandal construction for its purpose. Straps are attached to sole by loop stitches. Precisely where mud, sand, shell-pieces will collect and abrade the stitching. Infuriatingly this is the second pair from Amazon to fail in exactly the same way. Buy from stores or the manufacturer o be sure of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike OHare

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I buy a pair of these sandals every year for at least 5 years. My friends kid me about my Sandal suntan lines! But they are the most comfortable shoes I own. I walk 3 to 4 miles every day with my dogs and in the spring, summer and fall, I'm probably wearing these. Excellent support. They fit best after you get them wet.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: but I'm I sturdy woman, so don't need dainty shoes
customer_reviews.text: I buy men's sandals in order to get them wide enough for my feet, most people don't notice I'm wearing a man's sandal with this one, but I'm I sturdy woman, so don't need dainty shoes. I had a great pair of Columbia men's walking sandals a few years ago and I can't find anything even close to what I had, even from the Columbia brand, but these are the closest I've come to being as happy with a pair of sandals. I've used them all summer and they wear well, will easily last another year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Claire H

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a wide Teva and they don't make them so I ordered a men's in my size and it fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: The Velcro strap is very long to accommodate most widths ...
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro strap is very long to accommodate most widths, from narrow to wide. I have had problems with previous sandals on which the Velcro only works for wider feet. These have much more flexibility. On the downside is the lack of substantial arch support. The sole, however is well padded to insulate against any irregularities in the walking surface. Teva's reputation for a quality product remains intact.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Buy these sandals!!!
customer_reviews.text: My old pair of leather sandals began to wear out after several years. I felt continuing pain in my toe and heel. I used to buy Teva whitewater sandals with rubber straps to be able to grip on wet rocks while moving boats. But now that I'm getting older, I wanted to wear these fashionable Tevas around town. I found these sandals on Amazon and they were just what I needed. The leather straps are velcroed to make easy adjustment to fit the 'in-between' sizes. The cushioning on the sole and the adjustable straps allow me to custom fit to position my foot to allow the greatest amount of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Poor foot bed
customer_reviews.text: The foot pad used to be a comfortable suede like material and is now plastic or foam. No where near as nice as they used to be
customer_reviews.author: Richard Collette

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Best sandals I own, soft footbed, hard bottom, comfortable for all day walking.They don't fall apart in water like most others do. I will only buy Teva sandals. Their durabilty, comfort, and foot protection is the best in the business
customer_reviews.author: Dean T Takeuchi

customer_reviews.title: Katavi Teva
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sandal. I love Teva's have worn them for years, but every decade they seem to be getting cheaper made. Guess that is the way the world is now. These are as stated comfortable, but there is now way they will last as long as the old Teva's did. I still recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I owned a pair of these that lasted me quite ...
customer_reviews.text: I owned a pair of these that lasted me quite a few years. They fell apart so I ordered new ones. They fell apart within a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Steve da Sleeve

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review!!!
customer_reviews.text: The significant arch support was surprising at first, but I very quickly became use to it and realized that these are VERY comfortable!!! I really recognize this when I wear my other older sandals which are much less comfy!! Update: one year later, the sole has separated from the shoe part on the front of both shoes!! Glad I did not buy a another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Chemist

customer_reviews.title: Long time fan of the Katavi. Had some problems with the last pair I purchased, but hope this pair will be like my first pair!
customer_reviews.text: OK, let me explain my 3 star review. I love these Katavi Sandals. I live in the desert outside San Diego. My first pair lasted 3 years of everyday use, & that was 5 years ago. My last pair wore out completely after one year of everyday use. I'm hoping this pair will turn out to perform more like my first pair. So as far as the shoe itsel, I would give it 5 stars. But I give it 3 stars due to my experience with my last pair. I'll change this review to 5 stars if this pair holds up like the original Tevas. Cheers! J
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Quality and construction make these a better than basic Teva
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and construction make these a real step up from the basic tevas which my teenaged son was wearing for the past summer. He has had these for a couple of months now and absolutely loves them. The fact that they adjust three ways is a real advantage for a growing foot. Since we are suddenly the same size I have tried them on myself and am really quite impressed with the foot bed support and give. If you are considering these or the basic Tevas, I would definitely pay for the upgrade. They are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Iris74

customer_reviews.title: Still my favorite sandals
customer_reviews.text: My last pair of Tevas lasted for over 15 years of heavy year round use in Colorado.This pair seems at least as capable as the last pair so we will see! So far, they are very comfortable right out of the box, fit as well as my old pair, and don't look 15 years old! What else could you ask for? I expect to have these another 15 years, and will update my review if anything changes. I love my Tevas!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A.

customer_reviews.title: this is my second pair, my first one lasted 8 years
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 13 in regular sneakers but ordered up because I know from previously purchasing this type of teva sandal that it runs small and size 13 would have been too short. 14 now is too large for me but that was somewhat expected. I just wish even in bigger sizes, half sizes would be offered! Otherwise these sandals are great for casual summer outings and the beach.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but wont last
customer_reviews.text: Rugged looking,very comfortable right out of the box.the best teva ive purchased since manufacturing moved offshore.update...quality sucks..purchased in april..started to wear steadily in june..completely rotted in late july..worst teva ive ever purchased
customer_reviews.author: andrew j casey

customer_reviews.title: Left and Right not identical!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these and the heel strap on the right sandal is about an inch longer than the heel strap on the left sandal. Be careful ordering these! Something fishy here, maybe a knock-off product? Not sure what my options are...
customer_reviews.author: My review

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, easy to adjust to perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Teva sandals fit well and support your feet. I normally need shoe inserts but Teva sandals are have enough support that I can still walk without foot fatigue. The Katavi sandal allows good air circulation and prevents uncomfortable heating of your feet. My last pair of Teva sandals lasted many years.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence T Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Quality control needs to be stepped up
customer_reviews.text: Received a pair with the Velcro and stitching coming apart. Had to exchange. This should have been caught before shipment. The ones that are not falling apart are nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H

customer_reviews.title: good wear but not for the long haul.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these sandals since late April 2015 and I have worn them almost continually since. The only issue I have had is recently the strap anchors on the outside of my left sandal have come loose and I keep having to push them back into their slots every few days. Otherwise they are still comfortable although I would probably order a smaller size next time.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Allen Epstein

customer_reviews.title: These are a great sandal
customer_reviews.text: These are a great sandal. Durable. The rubber insole doesn't disintegrate, or absorb foot stink the way the cloth ones do. I'd order these again in a heartbeat. But... I'd go one size larger. I'm usually a 9.5 or 10 US, but the 10 is just a hair too small. Open toe, so no big deal, but still fits well enough to be my go-to shoe in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

product_meta.title: Teva Men's Katavi Outdoor Sandal
product_meta.description: Teva is an authentic icon in the outdoor industry. Founded in the early 1980's by a Colorado River guide, Teva pioneered the sport-sandal category. For more than 20 years on rivers, in canyons, and across the trails of the great outdoors, athletes and enthusiasts have traveled the globe comfortably and confidently in Teva footwear. Providing positive contributions to the world in which we play is at the core of everything Teva stands for. The Teva name itself is a Hebrew word meaning "nature" and the hand logo is the Hopi symbol for "friendship" and "water." Teva supports the outdoor athletic lifestyle and remains committed to innovation in outdoor performance footwear, the platforms which carry enthusiasts beyond the offices of the day-to-day and onto the rivers, trails, and canyons of the next adventure.
feature_bullets: Open-toe sport sandal featuring three adjustable hook-and-loop straps and rear pull-on loop
